description: The quintessential cool-weather button up, the Men's Incline Heavyweight Flannel fits right in on chilly days hitting the trail or the town. This faithfully warm and classically stylish flannel is the perfect addition to any casual outfit with double-brushed cotton for daily wear. Whether you feel most at home cozied up on the couch or exploring the great outdoors on two feet or two wheels, this is the flannel shirt for shorter days and cooler nights.
name: Marmot Incline Heavyweight Flannel LS - Mens
